title: Repo sync

details: Removed tier exclusivity labels for two GitHub Copilot features:
"Generate a description of the changes in a pull request" (previously Enterprise-only)
"Work on code changes and create a pull request" (previously Pro+/Enterprise-only)

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed tier exclusivity labels for two GitHub Copilot features:
  - "Generate a description of the changes in a pull request" (previously Enterprise-only)
  - "Work on code changes and create a pull request" (previously Pro+/Enterprise-only)
- Kept Enterprise-only label for "Create and manage documentation knowledge bases"

### Title
